name: 2022 4th International Conference on Image, Video and Signal Processing
content: IVSP 2022 information: 1\. IVSP 2022 is supported by ACM Singapore Chapter, Singapore Institute of Electronics and Gate to Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition(gtCVPR). 2\. Accepted papers will be published in the ACM International Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-8741-5), which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and to be submitted and reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). 3\. Prof. Kiyoshi Hoshino from Tsukuba University of Japan, Prof. Nicolas H. Younan from Mississippi State University of USA, Prof. Xudong Jiang from Nanyang Technological University of Singapore and Prof. Kenneth K. M. Lam from The Hong Kong Polytechnic University of Hong Kong will be the keynote speakers
